ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: Health is a diverse, talented, and passionate team striving to help people live healthier lives while keeping their data safe, private, and secure. We create amazing applications that enrich peoples’ lives in a tangible way, and provide APIs and SDKs to 3rd party developers so that their devices and applications can seamlessly integrate into Apple’s ecosystem. We are looking for an experienced ENG manager who has demonstrated ability in growing teams, developing processes and building and building great products. In this role, you’ll be a key contributor during all stages of software development, leading a talented engineering team to ensure can deliver great customer experiences as we continue innovating in a rapidly changing field. This is an opportunity to work in an extremely talented team, in a position where your work can make a difference in millions of lives. Learning and building of skill-sets is highly encouraged. This role has the opportunity to grow in many directions.

ul.li: Note: We don't require that you have experience with all of this to begin with, but it is directly relevant to the role.
2+ years experience leading software engineering teams
Excellent cross-functional communication and influence skills
Proven track record demonstrating the ability to build a team – attracting, hiring, retaining, motivating the best talent
Comfortable with fast paced schedule driven development
Strong software engineering and development life cycle knowledge
Obsessively passionate and inquisitive, and seek to solve everyday problems in innovative ways
Strong grasp of computer science fundamentals
Passion and prior experience designing and implementing outstanding user interfaces and customer experience
Demonstrated experience shipping high quality software products
Familiarity with wellness or medical concepts is a plus

div.p: Work with experts in their field to expand and support the broader health related efforts at Apple. • Collaborate with x-functional development teams to deliver features that surprise and delight our customers. • Advise and encourage engineering best practices to deliver quality features. • Define and grow a world class engineering team. • Represent the team and its technology in technical and project meetings • Define product features, functional specs and development schedules.
BS Computer Science or equivalent experience.
